name: Green Pixel (itch)
description:
Green Pixel it is 2D retro platformer with awesome synthwave music. Inspired by Undertale, Pony Island and others.

In this game you play pixel man, jump through levels full of monsters (spiders) and dangerous circular saws. There are no checkpoints if you die - start the level from the beginning.

This game is not what it seems

Solve the mystery of the Green Pixel. In some places, the game will try to break the fourth wall. There will be a lot of references and secrets. Each level has its own secret, sometimes it will be necessary to solve a puzzle to complete a level.
